mapper.select: SELECT q.id, q.description, q.title, q.type_id as "typeId", q.create_user_id as "createUserId" FROM `question` q where 1 = 1
mapper.update: update question set description = #{description}, title = #{title}, type_id=#{typeId}, create_user_id = #{createUserId}, update_time = #{updateTime} where id=#{id}
